data.title: Person: Royston Langdon
data.meta_description: Person: Royston Langdon: A comprehensive series of articles on this topic
data.text:
Liv Tyler is walking down the aisle again, as the maid of honor in a new romantic comedy - nearly one year after splitting from her rocker husband Royston Langdon.

Lenny Kravitz has denied reports he is set to join supergroup Velvet Relvover. The 'Let Love Rule' singer fuelled speculation he'll be Scott Weiland's replacement in the band after he joined Slash and his mates in the studio.

Liv Tyler has laughed off rumours she is dating her 'Incredible Hulk' co-star Edward Norton, insisting their relationship is "strictly platonic".

Liv Tyler is determined to raise her son Milo away from New York - because she wants the tot to enjoy life in the country.

Liv Tyler is 'doing well' following her split from rocker husband Royston Langdon, according to her superstar father Steven Tyler.

Hollywood star Liv Tyler and her British rocker husband Royston Langdon have announced their separation, after five years of marriage.

Liv Tyler has left question marks hanging over her marriage to British rocker Royston Langdon, after posing at New York's Costume Institute Gala on Monday night without a wedding ring.

Liv Tyler has hit out at Hollywood mothers who try to lose weight as soon as they've given birth.

Movie beauty Liv Tyler is considering quitting acting for good, in favour of a quiet life in the countryside.

Lord of the Rings beauty Liv Tyler has announced the name of her newborn baby boy - Milo William Langdon.

Liv Tyler has given birth to a son, making rocker Steven Tyler a grandfather, it emerged today.

Pregnant Hollywood beauty Liv Tyler is doing "fine" after she fainted in a restaurant on Saturday.

Pregnant actress Liv Tyler was keen to wait a few years after marrying before having children - until she starred alongside child star Raquel Castro in Jersey Girl.

Hollywood beauty Liv Tyler is plotting to escape to Britain for the birth of her first child - and intends to stay away from America until her baby is at least five- years-old.
